boardgame.name: A Brief History of the World
boardgame.description: A Brief History Of The World is just that: a sweeping ride through the history of mankind in the space of just a few hours. The game features fifty of the mightiest Empires ever known, from the dawn of Civilisation through to the Twentieth Century - Egypt, Assyria, Persia, Greece and Imperial Rome, the Huns and Mongols, the Arabs and the Ottoman Turks, the dynasties of China and kingdoms of India, Incas and Aztecs, Portugal and Spain, France, Britain, and Germany. Can you take on the mantle of Alexander or Caesar, Genghis Khan or Napoleon? Can you write your name into the pages of history and lead your Empires to victory?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Components include:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Giant Map Board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;180 plastic playing pieces_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;130 card counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; listing.notes: KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. BRIEF HISTORY OF THE WORLD: $60.26 Spiral Galaxy Games Ltd. Availability: PRE-ORDER - Game not yet released or awaiting reprint SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com
Brand new in shrink!

CLS Games Auction Lot XV 1. Steam Barons 2. A Brief History of the World 3. World Without End 4. Witch of Salem

Spiral Galaxy Games (SPG 002) A Brief History Of The World is just that: a sweeping ride through the history of mankind in the space of just a few hours. The game features fifty of the mightiest Empires ever known, from the dawn of Civilisation through to the Twentieth Century - Egypt, Assyria, Persia, Greece and Imperial Rome, the Huns and Mongols, the Arabs and the Ottoman Turks, the dynasties of China and kingdoms of India, Incas and Aztecs, Portugal and Spain, France, Britain amd Germany. Can you take on the mantle of Alexander or Caesar, Genghis Khan or Napoleon? Can you write your name into the pages of history and lead your Empires to victory? Components include: Giant Map Board 180 plastic playing pieces 130 card counters 42 Empire cards 54 Event cards 6 Epoch maps 1 Epoch chart This is a significantly revised version of History of the World. Re-implements: •History of the World

Spiral Galaxy Games (SPG 002) A Brief History Of The World is just that: a sweeping ride through the history of mankind in the space of just a few hours. Can you take on the mantle of Alexander or Caesar, Genghis Khan or Napoleon? Can you write your name into the pages of history and lead your Empires to victory? Components include: Giant Map Board 180 plastic playing pieces 130 card counters 42 Empire cards 54 Event cards 6 Epoch maps 1 Epoch chart This is a significantly revised version of History of the World. Re-implements: •History of the World

Spiral Galaxy Games (SPG 002) A Brief History Of The World is just that: a sweeping ride through the history of mankind in the space of just a few hours. The game features fifty of the mightiest Empires ever known, from the dawn of Civilisation through to the Twentieth Century - Egypt, Assyria, Persia, Greece and Imperial Rome, the Huns and Mongols, the Arabs and the Ottoman Turks, the dynasties of China and kingdoms of India, Incas and Aztecs, Portugal and Spain, France, Britain amd Germany. Can you take on the mantle of Alexander or Caesar, Genghis Khan or Napoleon? Can you write your name into the pages of history and lead your Empires to victory? This is a significantly revised version of History of the World.
